name: BitSniper
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
What is the project about?
BitSniper is a fully decentralized Chinese esports competitor developed by former Tencent and Ubisoft devs. It is a PvP player shooter game similar to CSGo and Call of Duty (COD)

What makes your project unique?
Our project delivers high quality graphics, and fast/smooth playability

History of your project.
Shinobiverse

What’s next for your project?
To finalise the game development and release for public

What can your token be used for?
In game playability - it allows players to earn as they play, also buy skins and upgrades
